txt.en: 'Get him!'
'Why is that good for us? It means they will not check here again!'
'Hide here while I get their attention, [placeholder].'
'Don't come out until after I've led them away!'
Celeblír plans to cause a distraction that will let you access Goblin-town's main gate.
'Hey! Goblins!'
Celeblír has returned, and without his goblin-pursuers.
'I led them on a merry chase. They will be some time returning!'
'Follow me, [placeholder], and stay close. You'll need some way to open the main gate to Goblin-town, but you won't be able to search for such a thing while there are goblins outside.'
'Once they're gone, search quickly! The longer you take, the more goblins will return!'
Wait for Celeblír to arrive
You were spotted by the goblins, endangering the plan to save Bilbo!
You were spotted by the goblins, endangering the plan to save Bilbo!
Bilbo has been taken to Goblin-town, and now Celeblír has a plan for getting inside.
Celeblír will distract the goblins, drawing them away from the entrance to Goblin-town. You must avoid detection by the goblins until he lures them away!
The goblins will surely have hidden a spare key to the gate somewhere outside Goblin-town.
With the spare key in your possession, you can now unlock the gate to Goblin-town.
Follow Celeblír to a good hiding place, avoiding detection by goblins
This stone does not serve to hide the spare key
You dig around in the cold snow, but find nothing
Suspicious as it seemed to you, this snow-drift does not hide the key
'Now that you have unlocked the gate, we should be able to rescue Bilbo!'
Mission: The Further Adventures of Bilbo Baggins, Chapter 7
Unlock the gate to Goblin-town
You find a spare key to Goblin-town buried in the snow beside this rock
Talk to Celeblír
The key turns in the lock. Now you can rescue Bilbo!
Remain hidden while Celeblír leads the goblins away
'Oy!'
Search for a spare key to the Goblin-town gate
'This way, down here.'
You search beneath and around the rock, and find nothing
'Who's that?'
'Stay close to me. Don't let them see you.'
You were so certain this rock would hide the key, but it did not
'Some Elf!'
'Perfect! The goblins wrecked this camp-site.'
